item.title: 等价演算
item.description: 基本等价式 双重否定律 $$ \lnot\lnot A = A $$ 等幂律 $$ A \lor A = A $$ $$ A \land A = A $$ 交换律 $$ A \lor B = B \lor A $$ $$ A \land B = B \land A $$ 结合律 $$ (A \lor B) \lor C = A \lor(B \lor C) $$ $$ (A \land B) \land C = A \land(B \land C) $$ 分配律 $$ A \lor (B \land C) = (A \lor B) \land (A \lor C)
